movie.title: A Thread of Deceit: The Hart Family Tragedy
movie.title_english: A Thread of Deceit: The Hart Family Tragedy
movie.title_long: A Thread of Deceit: The Hart Family Tragedy (2020)
movie.description_intro: An SUV with a female couple and their six adopted children plunge into the Pacific Ocean, leaving behind more questions than answers.
movie.description_full: An SUV with a female couple and their six adopted children plunge into the Pacific Ocean, leaving behind more questions than answers.

movies.title: Extortion
movies.summary: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a cold-blooded fisherman, and a desperate race against the clock to save his wife and son.
movies.description_full: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a cold-blooded fisherman, and a desperate race against the clock to save his wife and son.
movies.synopsis: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a cold-blooded fisherman, and a desperate race against the clock to save his wife and son.

movies.title: Killers on Parade
movies.summary: A young journalist turns to an assassin for help when a team of hired killers comes gunning for her.
movies.description_full: A young journalist turns to an assassin for help when a team of hired killers comes gunning for her.
movies.synopsis: A young journalist turns to an assassin for help when a team of hired killers comes gunning for her.

movies.title: Carlito's Way
movies.summary: A Puerto Rican ex-con pledges to stay away from his former drug dealing ways but finds himself being dragged back by his past connections and the naive machinations of his lawyer and best friend. Hoping to raise enough money to get away from New York, Carlito Brigante takes on the job of running a nightclub, renews an affair with a dancer but old associates and old instincts suck him back into a world of violence and mistrust.
movies.description_full: A Puerto Rican ex-con pledges to stay away from his former drug dealing ways but finds himself being dragged back by his past connections and the naive machinations of his lawyer and best friend. Hoping to raise enough money to get away from New York, Carlito Brigante takes on the job of running a nightclub, renews an affair with a dancer but old associates and old instincts suck him back into a world of violence and mistrust.

movies.title: Jarhead
movies.summary: Anthony "Swoff" Swofford, a Camus-reading kid from Sacramento, enlists in the Marines in the late 1980s. He malingers during boot camp, but makes it through as a sniper, paired with the usually-reliable Troy. The Gulf War breaks out, and his unit goes to Saudi Arabia for Desert Shield. After 175 days of boredom, adrenaline, heat, worry about his girlfriend finding someone else, losing it and nearly killing a mate, demotion, latrine cleaning, faulty gas masks, and desert football, Desert Storm begins. In less than five days, it's over, but not before Swoff sees burned bodies, flaming oil derricks, an oil-drenched horse, and maybe a chance at killing. Where does all the testosterone go?
